articles.title: Trial Run of New-type Trolley Bus Made in Presence of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Trial Run of New-type Trolley Bus Made in Presence of Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A trial run of new-type trolley bus was conducted in the presence of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, together with Ri Sol Ju.
					 The Supreme Leader went round the city aboard a trolley bus at midnight despite his busy time, saying that he would feel easy when he personally examines the test of new-type trolley bus with which he acquainted himself during his recent visit to the remodeled Pyongyang Trolley Bus Factory.
					
					 The trolley bus is comfortable and reliable as its damper and speed are good and it has no vibration and noise, he noted, appreciating its technical conditions.
					
					 He feels easy and proud and great as it was made by our workers, he said, adding that he would be very glad and satisfied to see the products of the strength of self-reliance.
					
					 Stressing the need to not only turn out a new thing but also steadily improve it in a technical way and further perfect its production process, he said that he would offer useful technological data and that it is needed to better the technical specifications of trolley bus and mass-produce it so as to normalize the passenger service in the capital city.
					
					 He earnestly called on the sector of the passenger service in the capital to strive to satisfactorily provide traffic convenience for the citizens in the cold winter days in particular, always regarding the popular masses' demand and appreciation as absolute standard and with the revolutionary outlook on the masses strictly based on this and the spirit of devoted service to the people.
					
					 Accompanying him were Vice-Chairman O Su Yong and Vice Department Director Jo Yong Won of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesperson Blasts Trump
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesperson Blasts Trump
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea gave the following answer to a question put by KCNA on February 4, as regards "State of the Union Address" made by Trump. 
					 In the "State of the Union Address", Trump described last year as a year fully recorded with "incredible progress and extraordinary success"- the year during which he pushed the American society and the world into disturbance through his reckless words and deeds as well as aggression moves dumbfounding the world public. This is indeed the height of Trump-style arrogance, arbitrariness and self-conceit.
					
					 The whole world is deeply concerned, seeing as an omen of new disaster the Address of Trump who asserted "America First" and "unmatched power" based on nuclear weapons while forcing other countries to submit themselves to the U.S. chauvinistic interest.  
					
					 Trump also insisted upon the "maximum pressure" against our country, viciously slandering our most superior people-centered social system. However, it is no less than screams of Trump terrified at the power of the DPRK that has achieved the great historic cause of completing the state nuclear force and rapidly emerged as the strategic state recognized by the world, and it is purely a nasty perversity aimed to disturb the advance of inter-Korean relations.     
					
					 Trump even reveals his sinister intention to do something against us by relying on strength while talking about "American resolve". Our self-reliant defense capability with the nuclear force as its backbone will, however, completely deter Trump and his lackeys from showing off on the Korean peninsula.  
					
					 If Trump does not get rid of his anachronistic and dogmatic way of thinking, it will only bring about the consequence of further endangering security and future of the United States.

articles.title: Foreign Guests Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Foreign Guests Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- D. Tsogtbaatar, minister of Foreign Affairs of Mongolia, and his party and other foreign guests visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun on Sunday.
					 They paid high tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues.
					
					 They paid tribute to the great leaders who lie in state.
					
					 They went round the halls where the orders the great leaders received are on display and the halls that house the cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Chongryon Headquarters Chairmen Vow to Contribute to National Reunification
articles.content:
Chongryon Headquarters Chairmen Vow to Contribute to National Reunification
Tokyo, February 3 (KNS-KCNA) -- Chairpersons of the Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statements on Jan. 31 in support of the appeal of the joint conference of the DPRK government, political parties and organizations.
					 Jo Il Yon, chairman of the Tokyo Metropolitan Headquarters of Chongryon, said that the Chongryon officials and Koreans in the metropolis would make patriotic efforts to create the climate of national reconciliation and reunification and open a new phase of national reunification under the banner of national independence, By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Kim Sang Il, chairman of the Kyoto Headquarters of Chongryon, vowed to resolutely reject the U.S. reckless nuclear war provocation moves against the DPRK and strengthen the unity of compatriots under the unfurled banner of national independence, By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Ri Ju Hak, chairman of Fukuoka Prefectural Headquarters of Chongryon, noted that the officials and compatriots would turn out as one in the campaign to frustrate the U.S. war moves against the DPRK and bring about the climate of peace on the Korean Peninsula so as to fulfill their responsibility and role as the driving force of the movement for national reunification.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Issue Works on Building Revolutionary Armed Forces
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Issue Works on Building Revolutionary Armed Forces
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il opened a new chapter of building regular armed forces and provided a great programme for building the most elite revolutionary army.
					 The President set forth the policy of building a regular revolutionary army by our own efforts in "On Founding the Party, State and Armed Forces in the Liberated Homeland," a speech delivered by him on August 20, Juche 34 (1945).
					
					 In "On Establishing the Pyongyang Institute" and other works he clarified the importance and significance of building regular armed forces and gives answers to the principled and fundamental problems arising in training military and political cadres and establishing self-supporting national defense industry.
					
					 "On the Occasion of the Founding of the Korean People's Army", the speech delivered by him at the military parade of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on February 8, 1948 is a great programme for building the KPA into the invincible people's armed forces and the revolutionary army with regular appearance.
					
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War, he made public hundreds of works elucidating the tasks and ways of further strengthening the KPA into the matchless revolutionary army which is equipped with the Party's revolutionary idea against imperialism and Juche-based art of war and in which iron-like discipline is established.
					
					 In his conclusion made at the 10th Plenary Meeting of the Fifth Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea in February 1975, he advanced a five-point policy to strengthen the People's Army into the cadre army, modern army and a-match-for-a-hundred revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 In a talk to soldiers of the 105th Mechanized Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960, Kim Jong Il put it forward as the main mission and the core of the struggle tradition of the KPA to defend the Party and the leader with lives.
					
					 In his other works, he clarified that to model the entire army on Kimilsungism is the general task for army building, and set forth tasks and ways to prepare all the service personnel to be Kimilsungists.
					
					 When talking to KPA commanding officers after inspecting the Dwarf Pine Company on Jan. 1, 1995, he elucidated the tasks and ways of intensifying the ideological education among the service personnel and making sustained great efforts to bolster up the military power of the People's Army.
					
					 Illuminated in other works is his idea that to firmly defend the socialist country is the most important revolutionary duty of the People's Army.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Disturbing Repair of Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses U.S. of Disturbing Repair of Inter-Korean Relations
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is working hard to check the trend of national reconciliation and unity created with much effort on the Korean peninsula.
					 High-ranking officials of the White House, Department of State, Department of Defense, CIA and Congress are spouting rubbish every day.
					
					 They are saying "Olympics should never be a ground for north Korea's social system propaganda", crying out for "tightening sanctions and pressure on north Korea in order not to be deprived of the initiative in handling the issue of the Korean peninsula."
					
					 Against this backdrop, the U.S. announced on Jan. 24 that it would independently impose additional sanctions upon the DPRK. Next day the under secretary of Treasury flied to south Korea to urge it to maintain thoroughgoing cooperation in imposing sanctions "upon the north."
					
					 The U.S. also sponsored meetings with those concerned of south Korean diplomacy and defense one after another, where it stressed the need for them to lead the north-south dialogue to the one for denuclearization.
					
					 It invited high-ranking security officials of Chongwadae and the military of south Korea to the U.S. to discuss the issue of intensifying "military cooperation" against the DPRK.
					
					 It massively brought nuclear aircraft carrier strike groups and nuclear strategic bombers to the Korean peninsula and its vicinity. It is asserting that it is to resume the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills right after the Winter Olympics. It staged a flying corps strike drill targeting the DPRK in league with the Japan Air "Self-Defense Force."
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that the U.S. is getting crazy to chill the atmosphere of improving north-south relations created by positive measures and proactive role of the DPRK.
					
					 If the U.S. truly supports and welcomes the north-south dialogue, there is no need for it to malignantly slander the DPRK's participation in the Winter Olympics on the international arena and to invite the south Korean diplomatic and security officials who are "busy with preparations for the Olympics" to the U.S. one after another to force its ill intention on them.
					
					 It is the sinister design of the U.S. to make the north and the south stand in confrontation eternally and create constant tensions on the Korean peninsula from the calculation that the better peace environment on the peninsula makes the U.S. lose its justification for igniting a nuclear war against the DPRK and puts the brakes on its drive for carrying out the strategy for dominating Asia.
					
					 The situation shows that smooth development of the north-south relations can never be expected but peace and stability on the Korean peninsula are gravely threatened as long as the U.S. persists in carrying out its sinister purpose and interference.
					
					 All Koreans should heighten their vigilance against the U.S. aggression and interference to bring the disaster of a fratricidal war and a nuclear war to this land, contrary to the trend of the times. They should foil the U.S. moves by dint of the national unity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Praises Kim Il Sung
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The undying feats of President Kim Il Sung, the founder-builder of the Korean People's Army (KPA), will be shining forever in the history of the country, says Rodong Sinmun in an article Sunday, and goes on:
					 Feb. 8, Juche 37 (1948) witnessed the KPA foundation - a national historic event of great significance in developing the Korean revolution and carving out the destiny of the Korean people.
					
					 Thanks to the KPA birth, the Korean people realized their cherished desire for modern regular army and put an end to the distress-torn history of the ruined country.
					
					 The KPA is regular revolutionary armed forces that took the first step and established the valuable tradition under the care of the ever-victorious iron-willed brilliant commander.
					
					 The army inflicted a disgraceful serious defeat on the U.S. imperialist aggressors who boasted of being "the strongest" in the world, which brought about the beginning of the decline for them. It has devotedly defended the cause of the leader and the Party with arms and also taken the lead in opening a broad avenue to the building of a thriving country in decades of grim revolution.
					
					 The credit for them rest with the great care.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces, blessed with illustrious leaders and brilliant commanders down through generations, are greeting the greatest heyday in its development.
					
					 Only victory and glory are in store for the KPA, which demonstrates its might as a revolutionary army of the Party advancing straight ahead aiming to the direction only pointed by the Party, an invincible army which can crush any aggressors at one blow and creators of the people's happiness.

articles.title: S. Korean Defense Minister Hit for His Rubbish against DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Defense Minister Hit for His Rubbish against DPRK
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- S. Korean Defense Minister Song Yong Mu let out a string of rubbish stoking confrontation with the DPRK at a recent "multi-party security meeting" held in Singapore.
					 He spouted such nonsense that if the DPRK "uses nuclear weapons" against the U.S. and south Korea, it will be "wiped off the face of the earth", adding that it is "anachronistic."
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says:
					
					 What Song uttered is just trickery to dishonor the nuclear deterrent of the DPRK for peace and add to the atmosphere of cooperation for worldwide sanctions and pressure on the DPRK.
					
					 His rubbish is just a reckless act of a pro-American confrontational maniac as it chills the hard-won climate for improving the north-south relations, pursuant to the U.S. hideous moves for a nuclear war.
					
					 There is a saying that one scabbed sheep will mar a whole flock.
					
					 No one can vouch that such reckless act of Song seized with inveterate repugnance and hostility toward the fellow countrymen would not scuttle the efforts for improving the inter-Korean relations.
					
					 Traitor Song should bear in mind that all Koreans are sharply watching his behavior. He should not forget even a moment that his impudent and reckless tongue-lashing may bring irreversible consequences.

articles.title: People's Party of S. Korea Criticizes Regime's Deceptive Step
articles.content:
People's Party of S. Korea Criticizes Regime's Deceptive Step
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The People's Party of south Korea held a press conference at the "National Assembly" on Jan. 31 criticizing the regime's deceptive "modification" of minimum wage system, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 Speakers there charged that the chairperson of the minimum wage committee who should speak for millions of minimum wage workers is going to retrogressively modify the minimum wage system.
					
					 Noting that 20 percent of the minimum wage workers are women, they said the retrogressive modification is little short of killing them twice.
					
					 They urged the regime to make finance necessary for the minimum wage hike by decreasing the aid fund for the conglomerates in order to realize true minimum wage hike.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Angola
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Angola
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- An Angolan preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Luanda on Jan. 24.
					 The international secretary of the Angolan Women's Organization who is a lawmaker was elected chairperson of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold film show, book and photo exhibition and other colorful political and cultural events from Jan. 24 to April 18.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Russia
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for marking the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was formed by the All-Russia Lenin Young Communist League on Jan. 24.
					 Podzorov, first secretary of the league, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee set a celebration period from Jan. 24 to Feb. 17 and decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il in the period.

articles.title: KPA Birthday to Be Marked in Benin
articles.content:
KPA Birthday to Be Marked in Benin
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Beninese national preparatory committee for marking the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA) was formed in Cotonou on Jan. 26.
					 Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader", was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events including celebration meeting and film show on the occasion.

articles.title: KPA Poses Fear to U.S. Imperialists: Swiss Bodies
articles.content:
KPA Poses Fear to U.S. Imperialists: Swiss Bodies
Pyongyang, February 4 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on Jan. 27 made public a joint statement ahead of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The statement praised President Kim Il Sung for founding and developing the KPA, noting:
					
					 The KPA worked a historic miracle by defeating the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces in the Fatherland Liberation War under the leadership of the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, an ever-victorious iron-willed brilliant commander and outstanding strategist.
					
					 The KPA forced the U.S. imperialists to kneel down before the Korean people for the first time in the world.
					
					 The KPA has resolutely foiled the U.S. imperialists' moves to start another war under the leadership of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The KPA has turned into invincible revolutionary armed forces with powerful war deterrent and thus made it possible to firmly guarantee the sovereignty and dignity of socialist Korea and peace and security of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The KPA with respected Marshal Kim Jong Un as its supreme commander is the only and one army in the world that poses a real fear to the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Long live the invincible Korean People's Army!
					
					 We pay the highest glory to the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and respected Marshal Kim Jong Un!

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia en la prueba de trolebus de nuevo tipo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia en la prueba de trolebus de nuevo tipo
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, junto con su esposa Ri Sol Ju, presencio en la prueba de trolebus de nuevo tipo.
					A la noche avanzada, el Maximo Dirigente tomo el vehiculo para dar vuelta a la ciudad, diciendo que se tranquilizara luego de tomar el trolebus, visto durante su direccion sobre la remodelada Fabrica de Trolebus de Pyongyang, realizada hace unos dias.
					
					En la ocasion evaluo el estado tecnico del vehiculo subrayando que es comodo, son buenos el amortiguador y la velocidad y no hay vibracion ni ruido.
					
					Refirio que el medio de transporte fabricado por nuestros obreros le considera como lo orgulloso y grande y agrego que esta muy contento y satisfecho cuando ve los productos fabricados por propia cuenta.
					
					Senalo la necesidad de mejorar sin cesar y de manera tecnica y perfeccionar y desarrollar ininterrumpidamente la cadena de produccion, sin vanagloriarse de nueva fabricacion, y refirio que enviara los datos tecnicos necesarios para que se libre la campana para renovar las caracteristicas tecnologicas de trolebus y producirlo mucho mas, de manera que hay que normalizar la operacion de transporte de pasajeros de esta capital.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente encomendo reiteradamente que la rama de transporte de pasajeros de la capital debe esforzarse por facilitar la comodidad de transito del pueblo, sobre todo en los dias invernales, al tomar siempre como norma absoluta la demanda y la evaluacion de las masas populares y al tener la concepcion revolucionaria sobre las masas populares y el espiritu de servir al pueblo con entera disposicion.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, O Su Yong y el subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jo Yong Won.

articles.title: Portavoz del MINREX critica mensaje de Trump
articles.content:
Portavoz del MINREX critica mensaje de Trump
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- En relacion con el "mensaje del ano nuevo" publicado por Trump, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 4 a la ACNC la siguiente respuesta:
					En su "mensaje del ano nuevo", Trump califico de "ano de progreso increible y exitos excepcionales" el 2017 en que con sus disparates, locuras y actos agresivos, produjo grandes disturbios en toda la sociedad estadounidense y el mundo. Esta evaluacion constituye el climax de la arrogancia, despotismo y egolatria por el estilo de Trump.
					
					Ahora todo el mundo se muestra preocupado considerando como aguero de nuevos desastres el acto verbal de Trump que al abogar por la "doctrina de America es primera" y la "supremacia de fuerza" basada en armas nucleares, impuso a otros paises estar sujetos a los intereses exclusivistas de EE.UU.
					
					En su mensaje, el calumnio tanto el regimen social de nuestro pais, el mas ventajoso centrado en las masas populares, hablando de la "maxima presion". Esta palabra no pasa de ser el alarido del atemorizado ante el poderio de la RPDC que al cumplir la historica causa de completar las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado, emergio bruscamente como Estado estrategico reconocido por el mundo. Igualmente, deja conocer las malas entranas de quien trata de obstaculizar la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur de Corea.
					
					Hablando de la "resolucion al estilo norteamericano", Trump expone su siniestro intento de atacar a nuestro pais por via militar, pero nuestras fuerzas de autodefensa nacional, centradas en las armadas nucleares, disuadiran consecuentemente las acciones insolentes de el y sus lacayos en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Si Trump no deja su modo de pensar anacronico y egocentrico, pondra en el peligro mas serio la seguridad y el futuro de su pais.

articles.title: ACNC rechaza en comentario acciones de EE.UU. en contra de reconciliacion N-S
articles.content:
ACNC rechaza en comentario acciones de EE.UU. en contra de reconciliacion N-S
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- EE.UU. intenta de una manera u otra romper la corriente de reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion coreana, preparada a duras penas en la Peninsula Coreana.
					En estos dias, las altas figuras de la Casa Blanca, el Departamento de Estado, el de Defensa, la CIA y el Congreso de Estados Unidos dicen que "hay que endurecer la sancion y presion al Norte (de Corea) para no perder el control del problema de la Peninsula Coreana" y "no se debe dejar que los Juegos Olimpicos Invernales se conviertan en el escenario de propaganda del regimen norcoreano".
					
					En tales circunstancias, EE.UU. publico el 24 de enero la nueva medida de sancion independiente contra la RPDC y envio el dia siguiente al secretario adjunto de Tesoro al Sur de Corea para instruir a este que mantenga la cooperacion perfecta en "sancionar al Norte". 
					
					Ademas, convoca en el extranjero las reuniones con los funcionarios de diplomacia y defensa del Sur de Corea para amonestarles que el dialogo Norte-Sur de Corea debe orientarse a la desnuclearizacion.
					
					Llamo a EE.UU. a los altos funcionarios de seguridad de Chongwadae y el circulo militar surcoreano para mandarles intensificar la "cooperacion militar" contra la RPDC.
					
					Por otra parte, EE.UU. anuncia el comienzo de los ejercicios militares conjuntos con el Sur de Corea tan pronto como terminaran los Juegos Olimpicos concentrando por otra parte en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno las flotillas de portaaviones nucleares y los bombarderos estrategicos nucleares.
					
					Realizo hasta el entrenamiento de ataque aereo contra la RPDC con las "Fuerzas Aereas de Autodefensa" de Japon.
					
					Esto deviene una prueba evidente de que EE.UU. se muestra cada vez mas desesperado para romper la atmosfera de mejoramiento de relaciones intercoreanas, preparada por las medidas protagonicas y esfuerzos activos de la RPDC.
					
					Si EE.UU. apoya de verdad las conversaciones intercoreanas, no tendria la razon de criticar tanto a la vista de la sociedad internacional la participacion de la RPDC en los Juegos Olimpicos y llamar uno tras otro a los funcionarios diplomaticos y de seguridad del Sur de Corea quienes estan muy "ocupados por los preparativos de la cita deportiva".
					
					Cada vez que se haga fuerte el clima de paz en la Peninsula Coreana, se perdera la justificacion de provocar la guerra nuclear anti-Norte y se complicara el cumplimiento de la estrategia de tomar la hegemonia en Asia. Por el temor a eso, EE.UU. intenta perpetuar el enfrentamiento entre ambas partes coreanas y mantener siempre en el territorio coreano la tensa situacion.
					
					La realidad demuestra que no se puede esperar el desarrollo sano de las relaciones intercoreanas y se veran gravemente amenazadas la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana mientras persistan el siniestro intento y la intervencion del imperio yanqui.
					
					Toda la nacion coreana debera frustrar con las fuerzas unidas la campana de agresion e intervencion de EE.UU. que intenta imponer al territorio coreano los desastres de confrontacion fratricida y guerra nuclear desafiando a la corriente de la epoca actual.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun refuta chismes de Song Yong Mu
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun refuta chismes de Song Yong Mu
Pyongyang, 4 de febrero (ACNC) -- En la "conferencia de seguridad multipartita" abierta hace poco en Singapur, el ministro de Defensa surcoreano Song Yong Mu disparateo que el Norte de Corea sera borrado del mapamundi si usa armas nucleares contra EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea y es "anacronico tal proyecto".
					Su acto verbal deviene una artimana para encubrir el caracter pacifista del disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC y hacer mas fuerte en escala internacional la atmosfera de sancion y presion contra ella.
					
					Puntualiza asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual fechado hoy y prosigue:
					
					De esa manera, Song, elemento conflictivo proyanqui, rompe el ambiente de mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas, preparado a duras penas, sumandose a las tentativas de guerra nuclear de EE.UU.
					
					Hay un refran que dice: "Un frijol echa a perder la olla".
					
					?Quien podria asegurar que la conducta conflictiva de Song, habituado a vetar y hostilizar sin motivos justos a la parte connacional, no va a echar a perder la corriente de mejoramiento de las relaciones intercoreanas?
					
					El traidor Song debe tener presente que toda la nacion esta observando cada movimiento de el. Y no debe olvidar ni un momento que sus acciones imprudentes pueden traer las consecuencias irreparables.
